name: GRcade Dark
description: This is a dark theme for GRcade. It works with the default theme, GResponsive.
additional_info:
2018-03-25:
Corrected table header backgrounds for Edit Notification Options sub-page. Made nested blockquotes easier to differentiate. Improved search box behaviour when hovered over.

2018-03-23:
Initial version. Does not affect white background on logo. May not work on all pages yet. Colour scheme will be improved in the future.
